title: Biobased, biodegradable but not bio-neutral: about the effects of polylactic acid nanoparticles on macrophages
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00335G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Véronique Collin-Faure, Marianne Vitipon, Hélène Diemer, Sarah Cianférani, Elisabeth Darrouzet, Thierry Rabilloud
Macrophages treated with polylactide beads degrade them but show various responses in the meantime.
